cards.definition: talking about many things
a person who babbles idiotically
a loud violent explosion either a literal one [such as the detonation of a bomb] or a figurative one (a vehement denunciation)
the sound of a car running over a pot-hole
a poor attempt to whistle loudly
the squeal of a frightened pig or the squeak of a frightened mouse
in a crowd or mob, the murmuring or grumbling sound of rising dissatisfaction or indignation
Lirra - the repetitive, melodic sound made by a soundbird
amble about in a feeble or listless way
to wander about deliriously
an intensive, eleventh-hour effort to complete or accomplish something before a deadline
to talk secretly
to waste time in bad company
to run away in fright
to forfeit or ruin by sluggishness or indolence
subsisting on handouts
universally learnt, educated in all things
study or science of happiness
study of mummies
a fiendishly subtle & dishonest sophist who specializes in splitting the thinnest of intellectual hairs
to comfort by giving refreshment & warmth; to cure by administering remedies
to walk fast, move forward rapidly
sleeping during the day
to glance at slyly or sideways
to put in danger, expose to risk
an obsession with unfinished work or business; a tendency to focus on things left
